languages.text: {n}Висирь шепчет молитву, обратив сокрытое маской лицо к лику Неумирающего. Вместо ветхих одежд на нем изящный доспех из кости и темного золота, отмеченный печатями чистоты. Услышав вас, он оборачивается.{/n} "Кибелла... Шаги твои я слышал давно. В шепотах Его".

traits.locale_text: {n}Висирь шепчет молитву, обратив сокрытое маской лицо к лику Неумирающего. Вместо ветхих одежд на нем изящный доспех из кости и темного золота, отмеченный печатями чистоты. Услышав вас, он оборачивается.{/n} "Кибелла... Шаги твои я слышал давно. В шепотах Его".

languages.text: {n}The Vizsier whispers a prayer, his masked face turned toward the Undying One's image. Instead of his usual threadbare clothes, he is wearing elegant armour of bone and dark gold, marked with purity seals. He turns as he hears you approach.{/n} "Kibellah... I have been hearing your footsteps for a long time. In His whispers."
languages.original_text: {n}Висирь шепчет молитву, обратив сокрытое маской лицо к лику Неумирающего. Вместо ветхих одежд на нем изящный доспех из кости и темного золота, отмеченный печатями чистоты. Услышав вас, он оборачивается.{/n} "Кибелла... Шаги твои я слышал давно. В шепотах Его".

{n}The Vizsier turns his blind face toward the Undying One's image and whispers a prayer. Instead of his threadbare clothes, he is wearing an elegant suit of armour made of bone and dark gold, and marked with seals of purity. He hears you and turns around.{/n} "Kibellah... I have been hearing your footsteps for a long time. In His whispers."

languages.text: {n}Le vizir murmure une prière, son visage masqué rivé vers l'image de l'Immortel. Au lieu de ses habituels oripeaux usés jusqu'à la trame, il porte une élégante armure d'os et d'or sombre, ornée de sceaux de pureté. Il vous entend approcher et se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Kibellah... Cela fait longtemps que j'entends vos pas dans Ses murmures. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier whispers a prayer, his masked face turned toward the Undying One's image. Instead of his usual threadbare clothes, he is wearing elegant armour of bone and dark gold, marked with purity seals. He turns as he hears you approach.{/n} "Kibellah... I have been hearing your footsteps for a long time. In His whispers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vizir murmure une prière, son visage masqué rivé vers l'image de l'Immortel. Au lieu de ses habituels oripeaux usés jusqu'à la trame, il porte une élégante armure d'os et d'or sombre, ornée de sceaux de pureté. Il vous entend approcher et se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Kibellah... Cela fait longtemps que j'entends vos pas dans Ses murmures. »

languages.text: {n}El Visir susurra una plegaria mientras su rostro enmascarado mira en dirección a la imagen del Inmortal. En lugar de sus ropas raídas habituales, viste una elegante armadura de hueso y oro negro marcada con sellos de pureza. Se vuelve al oír que te acercas.{/n} «Kibellah... Llevo mucho tiempo escuchando tus pasos. En Sus susurros».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier whispers a prayer, his masked face turned toward the Undying One's image. Instead of his usual threadbare clothes, he is wearing elegant armour of bone and dark gold, marked with purity seals. He turns as he hears you approach.{/n} "Kibellah... I have been hearing your footsteps for a long time. In His whispers."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Visir susurra una plegaria mientras su rostro enmascarado mira en dirección a la imagen del Inmortal. En lugar de sus ropas raídas habituales, viste una elegante armadura de hueso y oro negro marcada con sellos de pureza. Se vuelve al oír que te acercas.{/n} «Kibellah... Llevo mucho tiempo escuchando tus pasos. En Sus susurros».

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールは祈りを囁き、仮面で覆われた顔を不死の者の像の方へ向ける。いつものぼろぼろの服ではなく、純潔の印章が刻まれた骨と暗い金でできた立派な鎧を身につけていた。こちらが近づく足跡を聞いて彼は振り返る。{/n}「キベラ…ずっとお前の足音を聞いていたよ。あのお方の囁きの中で」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier whispers a prayer, his masked face turned toward the Undying One's image. Instead of his usual threadbare clothes, he is wearing elegant armour of bone and dark gold, marked with purity seals. He turns as he hears you approach.{/n} "Kibellah... I have been hearing your footsteps for a long time. In His whispers."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールは祈りを囁き、仮面で覆われた顔を不死の者の像の方へ向ける。いつものぼろぼろの服ではなく、純潔の印章が刻まれた骨と暗い金でできた立派な鎧を身につけていた。こちらが近づく足跡を聞いて彼は振り返る。{/n}「キベラ…ずっとお前の足音を聞いていたよ。あのお方の囁きの中で」

languages.text: {n}宿老在低声祈祷，戴着面具的脸望向不死之神的雕像。他并没有穿着平日惯常的破旧衣服，而是穿着一袭优雅的暗金色盔甲，上面装饰着白骨与纯洁印记。当你接近时，他转过了身。{/n}“绮贝菈……你的脚步声在我耳边响了很久，在祂的低语声中响起。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier whispers a prayer, his masked face turned toward the Undying One's image. Instead of his usual threadbare clothes, he is wearing elegant armour of bone and dark gold, marked with purity seals. He turns as he hears you approach.{/n} "Kibellah... I have been hearing your footsteps for a long time. In His whispers."

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老在低声祈祷，戴着面具的脸望向不死之神的雕像。他并没有穿着平日惯常的破旧衣服，而是穿着一袭优雅的暗金色盔甲，上面装饰着白骨与纯洁印记。当你接近时，他转过了身。{/n}“绮贝菈……你的脚步声在我耳边响了很久，在祂的低语声中响起。”

languages.text: {n}Der Wesir flüstert ein Gebet, sein maskiertes Gesicht dem Bildnis des Todlosen zugewendet. Statt seiner üblichen zerschlissenen Kleidung trägt er eine elegante Rüstung aus Knochen und Gold, mit Reinheitssiegeln versehen. Er wendet sich um, als er dich kommen hört.{/n} "Kibellah ... Ich höre Eure Schritte schon lange. In seinem Flüstern."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier whispers a prayer, his masked face turned toward the Undying One's image. Instead of his usual threadbare clothes, he is wearing elegant armour of bone and dark gold, marked with purity seals. He turns as he hears you approach.{/n} "Kibellah... I have been hearing your footsteps for a long time. In His whispers."

Ich höre Eure Schritte schon lange. In seinem Flüstern."

languages.text: {n}Vezir fısıldayarak dua ediyor. Maskeli yüzünü Ölmeyen'in suretine dönmüş. Her zamanki yırtık pırtık giysileri yerine kemikten yapılma, koyu altın renginde saflık mühürleriyle işlenen zarif bir zırh kuşanmış. Yaklaştığınızı duymasıyla birlikte arkasına dönüyor.{/n} "Kibellah... Ayak seslerin, O'nun fısıltılarında nicedir kulağıma çalınıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier whispers a prayer, his masked face turned toward the Undying One's image. Instead of his usual threadbare clothes, he is wearing elegant armour of bone and dark gold, marked with purity seals. He turns as he hears you approach.{/n} "Kibellah... I have been hearing your footsteps for a long time. In His whispers."
